entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023
